# Introduction




# Local Files

```{r, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)

localpath <- './DATA/'

# Get list of 
filenames <- list.files(path = localpath, pattern = 'DeviceStatus.csv$')


filepaths <- paste(localpath, filenames, sep = '')

# Initialize Empty Tibble
df_local <- tibble()

for (i in 1:length(filepaths)) {
  df_local <- rbind(df_local, read_csv(filepaths[i], col_types = cols(.default = 'c', 'Poll Time' = 't'),  show_col_types = FALSE))
}

glimpse(df_local)

```
